marquee.title: Health Coach
marquee.label: Open Source
marquee.problem: A personal health system that transforms raw activity data into structured, actionable guidance.
marquee.approach: Built as a fully transparent, end-to-end system with clear boundaries between data ingestion, logic, and output.

professional.title: AI Workflow Automation
professional.problem: Messy operational inputs created recurring manual reporting work
professional.approach: Structured deterministic pipelines with AI used only where ambiguity remained
professional.outcome: Consistent outputs with reduced manual effort

professional.title: AI Decision Support Systems
professional.problem: Ambiguous business questions lacked repeatable decision logic
professional.approach: Translated open-ended inputs into structured, reviewable outputs
professional.outcome: Improved clarity and speed of decision-making

professional.title: Governed Data Systems
professional.problem: Unvalidated data created downstream risk for AI use
professional.approach: Designed validation, ownership, and audit-ready ingestion layers
professional.outcome: Safer foundations for automation and analysis
